name: The Royal Rajasthan
summary: Rich Heritage, Majestic Forts, Unveiling the Land of Maharajas and Vibrant Culture Come Together.
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through Rajasthan's magnificent attractions. Explore the regal City Palace in Udaipur and witness the breathtaking views of Lake Pichola. Immerse yourself in the spiritual ambiance of the revered Jagdish Temple and the serene Sahelion ki Bari. Pay homage to the valiant Maharana Pratap at his Smarak and soak in the beauty of Fateh Sagar Lake and Sajjangarh Monsoon Palace. Experience an exhilarating ride on the Karni Mata Ropeway. Discover the architectural marvels of Kumbhalgarh Fort, including the enchanting Badal Mahal and Neelkanth Mahadev temple. Admire the intricate sculptures of Ranakpur Jain Temple.
 Unveil the historical treasures of Jodhpur at Meherangarh Fort, Ummaid Bhawan Palace, and Jaswant Thada. Indulge in the spiritual aura of Pushkar's Holy Lake and marvel at the divine Brahma Temple. Finally, immerse yourself in the grandeur of Jaipur as you explore the majestic City Palace, witness the astronomical wonders at Jantar Mantar, admire the iconic Hawa Mahal and Jal Mahal, visit the tranquil Birla Temple, and relish the captivating beauty of Amber Fort.

name: Sikkim & Darjeeling
summary: Misty Mountains and Vibrant Cultures: Discovering Sikkim & Darjeeling
description:
Embark on a captivating journey through the enchanting landscapes of Sikkim and Darjeeling. Begin your trip with a scenic drive from Bagdogra Airport to the charming city of Gangtok, the capital of Sikkim. Explore the sacred Tsongmo Lake and visit the revered Baba Mandir. Optional additional sightseeing includes Nathula Pass, subject to permit availability. Continue your journey to Pelling, visiting Namchi along the way to witness the Sai Mandir and Siddheshwar Dham. In Pelling, enjoy the breathtaking views of Kanchenjunga Falls, Khecheopari Lake, and other attractions.
 Next, make your way to Darjeeling, known as the 'Queen of the Hills.' Discover the Batasia Loop, Japanese Temple, Peace Pagoda, and other iconic sites. Optional activities include a Toy Train Joy Ride and a visit to Tiger Hill for a stunning sunrise view. Immerse yourself in the beauty of tea gardens and explore the Tibetan Refugee Self-help Centre. Conclude your memorable journey by indulging in the local market and savoring the unique experiences each destination offers.

name: Unwind in Kerala
summary: Explore serene backwaters, lush tea plantations, pristine beaches, and indulge in authentic Ayurvedic treatments, making it a journey of relaxation and cultural discovery.
description:
Embark on a captivating tour of Kerala's mesmerizing destinations. Start your journey in Cochin and proceed to the breathtaking hill station of Munnar. Enjoy the scenic beauty of Cheeyapara and Valara Waterfalls en route. Explore Munnar's attractions, including the Rose Garden, Tea Gardens, Madupetty Dam, and Echo Point. Next, head to Thekkady, famous for its wildlife sanctuary and spice plantations. Experience a thrilling boat ride in the Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary and immerse yourself in the flavors of the spice plantations. Continue to Alleppey, known for its enchanting backwaters, and spend a memorable night on a houseboat, enjoying the tranquility of the backwaters.
 Journey to Trivandrum and visit the awe-inspiring Jatayu Earth's Centre. Explore the southernmost tip of India, Kanyakumari, and witness the convergence of three water bodies. Visit the majestic Thiruvalluvar Statue and the Vivekananda Rock Memorial. Conclude your trip with a visit to Trivandrum's iconic landmarks, including Sree Padmanabhaswamy Temple, Napier Museum, and Attukal Bhagavathy Temple. Depart from Trivandrum with beautiful memories of Kerala's cultural and natural treasures.

name: Andaman Islands
summary: Paradise Unveiled - Serene Beaches, Pristine Waters, and Tropical Bliss
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through the mesmerizing Andaman Islands. Begin your adventure in Port Blair, where you can relax and enjoy the pristine Corbyn's Cove Beach, surrounded by coconut palms. Witness the captivating Sound and Light Show at Cellular Jail, a reminder of India's heroic freedom struggle. Continue your expedition to Havelock Island, known for its breathtaking Radha Nagar Beach, hailed as one of Asia's best beaches. Indulge in water activities or simply unwind on the white sands.
 Discover the wonders of Elephant Beach, where snorkeling, scuba diving, and sea walks offer an up-close encounter with vibrant marine life. Next, set sail to Neil Island and experience the enchanting Laxmanpur Beach and Bharatpur Beach, perfect for watching stunning sunsets and engaging in thrilling water sports. Conclude your trip with a return to Port Blair, cherishing the cherished memories of your Andaman exploration.

name: Sacred Hills and Cultural Delights
summary: Unveiling the Charms of Dalhousie, Dharamshala and Amritsar
description:
Embark on a delightful journey to Amritsar and the picturesque hill stations of Dalhousie and Dharamshala. Explore the charming town of Dalhousie, known for its pleasant climate and stunning mountain views. Visit the enchanting Khajjiar, often referred to as Mini Switzerland, and enjoy exciting activities like horse riding and paragliding. Take a scenic boat ride at Chamera Lake and soak in the beauty of the surroundings. Continue your trip to Dharamshala, the winter capital of Himachal Pradesh, where you can visit the Bhagsunag Temple, Dalai Lama Monastery, and enjoy a ropeway ride.
 Explore Amritsar and visit the sacred Golden Temple and historic sites like Jallianwala Bagh and Gobindgarh Fort. Witness the flag-lowering ceremony at the Attari Wagah Border and savor the flavors of Punjabi cuisine at Sadda Pind. Conclude your journey with cherished memories and depart for your hometown.

name: The Majestic Wonders of Dubai
summary: Dazzling Skyscrapers, Desert Adventures, and Cultural Delights Await in Dubai, the City of Contrasts.
description:
Embark on a memorable trip to Dubai with a comfortable stay at the Admiral Plaza Hotel. Upon arrival at Sharjah International Airport, meet the airport representative and transfer to the hotel. Enjoy a leisurely morning to relax or explore the city on your own. In the afternoon, embark on an exciting Desert Safari experience with a bumpy ride on the sand dunes, followed by activities at the desert camp and a delicious dinner with a belly dancing show.
 The next day, go on a half-day Dubai City Tour, visiting iconic landmarks like the Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Mosque, Burj Khalifa, and Dubai Mall. Experience a delightful Dhow Cruise in the evening, cruising along Dubai Creek while enjoying dinner. Spend a full day at leisure to explore the city on your own. On the final day, visit the beautiful Miracle Garden before checking out from the hotel. Transfer to Sharjah International Airport for your return flight.

name: The Nepal Adventure Escape
summary: Pokhara known for its stunning lakes, Chitwan for wildlife encounters, and Kathmandu for its vibrant cultural heritage
description:
Embark on a captivating journey through Nepal, starting with a scenic drive from Kathmandu to Pokhara. Enjoy the breathtaking sunrise at Sarangkot Viewpoint and a tranquil boat ride on Phewa Lake. Explore Pokhara's highlights, including David's Fall and the International Mountain Museum. Continue your adventure to Chitwan National Park, where you'll experience thrilling wildlife encounters on elephant back or Jeep safari.
 Take a canoe ride along the Rapti River and witness the mesmerizing Tharu Cultural Dance Show. Return to Kathmandu, visiting the Manakamana Temple en route, and delve into the city's rich cultural heritage. Explore sacred sites like Pashupatinath and Bodh Nath Stupa, immersing yourself in spiritual traditions. Conclude your trip with fond memories and depart from Kathmandu, carrying the blessings of this enchanting land.

name: Enchanting Himalayan Escapade
summary: Three enchanting destinations nestled in the Himalayas. Experience the charm of hill stations, indulge in thrilling adventures.
description:
Embark on a captivating journey through the scenic landscapes of Shimla, Manali, and Kasol. Start your adventure by exploring the vibrant streets of Shimla, visiting popular attractions such as the Mall Road, Johnnie's wax museum, and Shimla Church. The next day, venture to Kufri to enjoy thrilling activities at the Kufri Fun Campus and immerse yourself in the beauty of the Winter Sports Capital. Continue your trip to Manali, passing by picturesque sights like the Pandoh Dam and Beas River. Experience the majestic Rohtang snow point and indulge in snow activities.
 Discover the ancient temples of Jagatsukh Gayatri Mandir, Vashista Kund, and Hidimba Mandir in Manali, followed by a visit to the enchanting Solang Valley. Proceed to Kasol and witness the hot water springs of Manikaran, and if conditions allow, enjoy a thrilling water rafting experience in the Beas River. Conclude your journey in Chandigarh, where you can explore the beautiful Pinjore Garden, Rock Garden, Sakuna Lake, and Rose Garden before departing from Chandigarh Airport.

name: The Breathtaking Bhutan
summary: Unveiling the Mysteries of the Thunder Dragon. Explore the enchanting landscapes and uncover the secrets of this magical kingdom.
description:
Embark on a scenic journey through Bhutan and Darjeeling with this itinerary. The tour begins with a drive from Bagdogra Airport to Phuentsholing, where you'll check in at the hotel. The following day, after obtaining the necessary permits, you'll continue to Thimphu and explore attractions like the Tashichho Dzong, Memorial Chorten, and National Library. The journey then takes you to Paro, known for its picturesque landscapes and historic sites, including a visit to the famous Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Nest) perched on a cliff.
 Afterward, you'll return to Phuentsholing before heading to the enchanting hill station of Darjeeling. In Darjeeling, you'll enjoy sightseeing at popular spots like Batasia Loop, Ghoom Monastery, and the Himalayan Mountaineering Institute. The tour concludes with a drive back to Bagdogra Airport. Throughout the journey, you'll be immersed in the natural beauty and cultural heritage of these captivating destinations.
